summary: This is a brief email sent on August 13, 2019, warning that The New York Times will soon report that personnel at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) falsified records, likely in relation to the circumstances surrounding Jeffrey Epstein's death.

events.title: Email Warning of Impending MCC Report
events.description: An email is sent stating that The New York Times will soon report that personnel at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) falsified records.

keyFacts: The email is dated August 13, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
It warns of an impending New York Times report about falsified records at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).
The subject of the email is 'Epstein', directly linking the warning to his case.
The allegation of falsified records by MCC personnel suggests potential misconduct or a cover-up related to Epstein's incarceration or death.
